q_ch: Advanced裁剪组还未完成的裁剪任务是哪些顾客的订单？
q_en: Which customer orders are the cutting tasks that the Advanced Cutting Group has not yet completed?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Advanced Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT order_product_id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '6' AND status != 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs for cutting tasks assigned to "Advanced Cutters" that are not yet completed

response: Hey there! 😊 It looks like the "Advanced Cutters" team is on top of their game because there are no pending cutting tasks for them at the moment. All tasks assigned to them have been completed. 🎉 If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
